sentence: Sinema’s fight with the left has overshadowed the 2022 reelection bid of Mark Kelly, Arizona’s other Democratic senator, who will be trying to hold on to the seat he won in a special election.
author: Associated Press
title: Arizona Democrats censure Sinema over voting rights bill

sentence: WFB: Sen. Mark Kelly (D., Ariz.) swore off corporate PAC contributions, but money from corporations is still finding a way into his campaign coffers.
author: MJA
title: Arizona Sen. Mark Kelly(D) swore off corporate PAC contributions, but money from corporations is still finding a way into his campaign coffers

sentence: Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., a member of the Senate Armed Services Committee, said in an interview that enforcing a no-fly zone would require a level of involvement that he can't support.
author: Ronald J. Hansen
title: After Zelenskyy speech, Arizona delegation calls for more aid to Ukraine without combat

sentence: Just 19% of Arizona Democratic primary voters have a favorable opinion of Sinema, according to a January Data for Progress poll, compared to 78% for fellow Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Kyrsten Sinema Assures Corporate Donors She’ll Protect Their Tax Breaks
